about_the_game:
Cubic Neon Nightclub is a single player futuristic nightclub simulator where you can import your own DJ mixes and music. Immerse yourself among pretty lights, lasers and visual effects while you dance the night away! This VR experience was made by ravers, for ravers during a time where we just need to have a good dance in our isolationist world.

- Import your own music, select songs in game at the DJ booth, fast forward through long mixes or mute the music so you can play your own from an external program. You can't actually DJ in this experience unfortunately.
- Play with a beautiful visual effects as "flow toys" while you dance--similar to poi. There are buttons around the scene that trigger special effects.
- Explore different sections and heights of the club as you dance next to other partying NPCs
- See your body in the scene for that extra immersion factor

Please enjoy and have fun in your own personal nightclub!

Notes on importing music:
Must be in .ogg file format - place in the project folder: ...[GameDirectory]\Cubic Neon Nightclub_Data\StreamingAssets\Music\.. ). There are plenty of free music file converters (from mp3, etc) to .ogg on the web.

FOR AVG VIRUS PROTECTION USERS:
AVG and perhaps other virus software tends to throw a false positive for an "IDP.Generic" malware for this application despite our best efforts. The .exe file should simply be added to your exception list. Apologies for the inconvenience.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may not be appropriate for all ages as there is nudity or sexual content and use of alcohol.

detailed_description:
Cubic Neon Nightclub is a single player futuristic nightclub simulator where you can import your own DJ mixes and music. Immerse yourself among pretty lights, lasers and visual effects while you dance the night away! This VR experience was made by ravers, for ravers during a time where we just need to have a good dance in our isolationist world.

- Import your own music, select songs in game at the DJ booth, fast forward through long mixes or mute the music so you can play your own from an external program. You can't actually DJ in this experience unfortunately.
- Play with a beautiful visual effects as "flow toys" while you dance--similar to poi. There are buttons around the scene that trigger special effects.
- Explore different sections and heights of the club as you dance next to other partying NPCs
- See your body in the scene for that extra immersion factor

Please enjoy and have fun in your own personal nightclub!

Notes on importing music:
Must be in .ogg file format - place in the project folder: ...[GameDirectory]\Cubic Neon Nightclub_Data\StreamingAssets\Music\.. ). There are plenty of free music file converters (from mp3, etc) to .ogg on the web.

FOR AVG VIRUS PROTECTION USERS:
AVG and perhaps other virus software tends to throw a false positive for an "IDP.Generic" malware for this application despite our best efforts. The .exe file should simply be added to your exception list. Apologies for the inconvenience.

name: Cubic Neon Nightclub

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset and motion tracking controllers required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset and motion tracking controllers required

short_description: Cubic Neon Nightclub is a single player futuristic nightclub sim where you can import and dance to your own DJ mixes and music. Immerse yourself among pretty lights, lasers and visual effects while you dance the night away!
